subject: Contract openings for FullStack Java Exp.at Louisville, Kentucky (Only GC/USC)
body:
"Unsubscribe

        Hi,



        Please find the below requirement and let me know your interest along with one copy of your updated resume at Shree@emonics.com ASAP



        Title: FullStack .Net Lead with Java Exp.

        Location: Louisville, Kentucky

        Visa: Only USC/GC

        Type: Contract



        JD:

        Â·         Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC)

        Â·         8+ years of development experience using C# .NET

        Â·         Knowledge of at least one of the .NET languages (e.g. C#, Visual Basic .NET) and HTML5/CSS3

        Â·         Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)

        Â·         Understanding of Agile methodologies

        Â·         Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills

        Â·         Able to work well in a team setting

        Â·         Should have knowledge/experience on Java, React JS



        Unfeigned Regards



        Shree Ranjita

        Lead Associate

        Cell ::  201-977- 0083

        Fax: (201) 604 6123

        Email address- Shree@emonics.com

        Emonics LLC

        1260 Centennial Ave, Suite 1A

        Piscataway, NJ- 08854"

subject: Java Developers Needed!
body:
Hi Pedro,
 
My name is Nick Sullivan. I am an IT Recruiter for Diversant LLC's National Application Development Team. Several of our clients on a national and relationship basis are hiring. After taking a look at your resume it seems like you could be a good fit for one or more positions. Please see the details below and let me know your thoughts.


W2 Contract- No C2C or Corp to Corp at this time   (RELATIONSHIP BASED)
Sponsorship is Provided!!!!


Note: If this position or locations are not the best match feel free to respond with any questions you may have.


Locations (Everything is remote until further notice)



Key Responsibilities:

JOB DESCRIPTION:
Full Stack Java Engineer


Backend: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Restful APIs, Spring Cloud Streams, Kafka, JUnit, Automation Testing, Performance Testing, SQL and NoSQL Databases
UI: Angular, Typescript, Unit Testing, Automation Testing, Performance Testing
CI/CD: Git, Jenkins, AWS ECS, EC2, IAM, S3 etc


Regards,
Nicholas Sullivan
DIVERSANT LLC
Recruiter
331 Newman Springs Road Bldg. 3, 2nd floor, Suite 350
Red Bank, NJ 07701
nsullivan@diversant.com
(732) 759-6052
 
View all of our open job requirements on our home page http://www.diversant.com under *Job Search*. If you know any IT Professionals who are looking for new job opportunities, please pass along my contact information!
 

 
DIVERSANT (diversant.com) is one of the largest minority-owned IT staffing firms in the U.S. We offer rewarding career opportunities with many of the nation’s leading corporations. Our experienced recruiters understand what hiring managers look for in a candidate and provide our applicants with the proper support and guidance along the entire application and interviewing process. We offer opportunities on a contingent, contract-to-hire, and direct hire basis. At DIVERSANT, we are committed to providing the highest level of service and satisfaction to our customers, consultants, and employees.
 
 
DIVERSANT provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, DIVERSANT complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.
 
 
 

If you would like to unsubscribe from Diversant LLC, please click here.

subject: Backend Engineer .NET Core :: Sunnyvale, CA/Remote
body:
Hello
My name is Deepak and I work with Caspex. I am currently looking for Backend Engineer with one of our direct client. Please see the job details below and let me know if you would be interested in this role. If interested, please send me a copy of your resume, your contact details, your availability and a good time to connect with you.

Location-Sunnyvale, CA/Remote
Job Title- Backend Engineer

Job Description:
Minimum Qualifications
BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent, with 8 or more years in software engineering, design and architecture
Experience in cloud technologies and cloud native designs
Fluency in one of the programming languages such as C#, C++, Go
Deep understanding and experience with SQL/No SQL databases, messaging (Kafka), Microservices
Experience with public cloud providers
Experience in managing entire software development lifecycle with a team of 6-8 engineers
Strong communication skills with experience in working with internal as well as external stakeholders

Thank you.
Deepak
48531 Warm Springs Blvd. #405,
Fremont, CA 94539
(510) 455-3928

If you would like to unsubscribe from CASPEX, please click here. .NET Core

subject: Immediate need_.NET Core Tech Lead_Baltimore, Maryland_Full Time_Remote till Covid-19
body:
Hello,

 

My name is Amit and I'm a Recruiter at Diverse Lynx. We provide IT Consulting Services to our customers’ immediate and long-term resource needs. I am contacting you either because your resume has been posted to one of the internet job sites to which we subscribe or you had previously submitted your resume to Diverse Lynx. We now find your resume .Net Tech Lead with our client at Baltimore, Maryland.

 

Job Title: .Net Tech Lead

Location:  Baltimore, Maryland

Duration: Full Time

 

Job Description

Mandatory Skills –

.NET core , Webservices, Openshift

Good to have –

Couchbase or any No SQL , Fuse

 

Technical/Functional Skills

The candidate must have experience in using development tools, industry and IS Standards. The position will be responsible for creating designs and working within the team to implement the most efficient product possible. This position requires knowledge of the project development life cycle, good oral and written communication, and strong problem solving skills.

Expertise in  Technologies - Open Shift ,  .NET core, Couch base , Fuse(Apache Camel) , Web Services

·         Over 10 years of experience in Microsoft technologies - .NET, .NET Core,  MVC.NET, Microsoft Web APIs, Services, .Net framework (4.5 and above)
Good command on Openshift.

·         Hands on knowledge on Couchbase

·         Developing Web API services (Rest services) and experience with microservices architecture

·         Candidate must have very rich .Net background and have the capabilities to design and detailed knowledge of MVC.Net, ASP.Net

·         Must have experience in database objects development, modeling using one of the available tools

·         Must have worked on end-to-end from requirements till implementaion in large engagements

·         Must have experience in Support & Maintenance Projects

·         Must have strong communication skills and should have worked with multiple Technical experts from the industry

·         Strong object oriented design concepts & implementation

 

Roles and responsibility

·         Analysis of functional / technical requirements

·         Identify key areas of development . Guide / support team for the development

·         Define technical architecture and create detailed technical design specifications including Service specifications, Class Diagrams, Sequence Diagram, Data Models

·         Coordination with Technical and business users communities and getting sign-off on the artefacts

·         Define implementation / deployment model

·         Define project specific design pattern, guidelines and checklist.

·         Individual contributor for some components

 

 

Regards

Amit Singh

Diverse Lynx LLC

Office: 732-452-1006 Ext 446

Direct: 732-724-7743

Email: amit.singh@diverselynx.com | URL: http://www.diverselynx.com 

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/amit-singh-amy-27a467b5

 

Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Description: Image result for diverse lynx logo

 

“for our open requirements, please visit Current Openings

 

Note: Diverse Lynx LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without any discrimination. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their ability, competence, and performance of the essential functions of their positions. We promote and support a diverse workforce at all levels in the company. This is not an unsolicited mail and if it is not intended for you or you are not interested in receiving our e-mails, you can unsubscribe. We are sorry for any inconvenience.
